item.title: Code That Breaking SRP
item.description: What is SRP? Single responsibility principle (SRP) states that a class or module should have one, and only one reasone to change. Robert Cecil Martin (2008) Clean Code, : . #1 public class UserValidator { private Cryptographer cryptographer; public boolean checkPassword(String userName, String password) { User user = UserGateway.findByName(userName); if (user != User.NULL) { String codedPhrase = user.getPhraseEncodedByPassword(); String phrase = cryptographer.decrypt(codedPhrase, password); if ("Valid Password".equals(phrase)) { Session.initialize(); return true; } } return false; } } Robert Cecil Martin (2008) Clean Code, : .
